nodes.bodyText: This technically causes an issue where if a modification to actions occurs outside of the ctor this class would no longer see that effect. But i don't think we support that case
It sounds to me like it would be a bug we need to fix if the situation arises.
I'm not sure it would be a bug here but a "wrong usage" on the other side, no?
It should be a bug but I'm merely making a point of mentioning it.
